worldofzuul

Class Answer

  • java.lang.Object
    • worldofzuul.Answer

  • public class Answer
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds information regarding each answer. This is associated with the Question class, and both are a part of the Conversation "system".

    • Constructor Detail

      • Answer

        public Answer(int nextLineNumber,
              java.lang.String referenceWord,
              java.lang.String reactText,
              java.lang.String executionLine)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        nextLineNumber - the next question to proceed to, if this answer is answered
        referenceWord - what word are used by the user to "answer" this answer
        reactText - what the NPC replies
        executionLine - what methods / affects this answer has, if the answer is answered
